title: Controlling quality is everybody's business
creator_credit: Industrial Education Films and Wallace J. Richardson
brief_description: Demonstrates the need for a sound working knowledge of the principles of effective quality control, and how these may be applied. The film also dramatises the importance of maintaining good quality, and shows how everyone can help.
